articles.content: The aurora borealis or northern lights is a phenomenon that is nothing short of a treat for those living around the northern latitudes. While the auroras have been spotted dancing in the northern ski… [+2311 chars]

articles.author: Trends Desk
articles.title: ‘Oldest matter humankind can touch’: Space treasures auctioned for $1.2 million - The Indian Express
articles.description: British auction house Christie’s sold close to 60 pieces of space treasure on Wednesday, February 23, 2022.
articles.content: On Wednesday, British auction house Christies concluded the sale for many space treasures and racked up more than 1.2 million dollars in sales.The online-only auction was titled, Impact: Martian Luna… [+1593 chars]

articles.title: Artificial neurons 'close' Venus flytrap - ecns
articles.description: The latest research has found that an artificial neuron could be connected to the cells of a Venus flytrap and induce its leaves to close.
articles.content:
(ECNS) -- The latest research has found that an artificial neuron could be connected to the cells of a Venus flytrap and induce its leaves to close.
Simone Fabiano at Linköping University in Norrköp… [+1151 chars]
